short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save gift ideas from web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üéÅ Overview
Never miss a gift idea again! The Gift Idea Saver extension allows you to effortlessly save and organize your gift ideas directly from your browser. Whether you've found the perfect birthday present or just want to bookmark a general gift idea for later, our extension has you covered.

Key Features:

Save Ideas Instantly: Found a perfect gift online? Save it in a click.
Categorize Your Gifts: Birthday, Anniversary, Wedding, and more. Sort your gifts to easily locate them later.
Add Descriptions: Never forget why a certain gift caught your eye. Add descriptions and specify the intended recipients.
Easy Access: Access your saved gifts in a snap directly from the browser toolbar.
Mark your gifts as purchased to save them in a separate list so you don't forget.
Edit and Delete: Change your mind? No problem. Edit or delete your saved gift ideas anytime.
Streamlined Design: An intuitive, user-friendly interface combined with a visually appealing design inspired by gift motifs.

Permissions & Privacy:

We value your privacy. The Gift Idea Saver extension only stores data locally and requires minimal permissions.

Install Gift Idea Saver today and turn every day into a gifting inspiration! üéâ
